00030 /*
00031 ** Connectivity methods
00032 */
00033 
00034 int clSurface::AddConnection(const int numberID,
00035                              const int north, const int east,
00036                              const int south, const int west)
00037 {
00038   int numConnect;
00039 
00040   // Create new entry
00041   stConnect newConnection;
00042   newConnection.numberID = numberID;
00043   newConnection.north    = north;
00044   newConnection.east     = east;
00045   newConnection.south    = south;
00046   newConnection.west     = west;
00047 
00048   // Add to list
00049   numConnect = connectList.AddItem(newConnection);
00050 
00051   // Add also to remainList when not all connections could be established.
00052   // (Reason: performance)
00053   if(north==-1 || east==-1 || south==-1 || west==-1) remainList.AddItem(numConnect);
00054 
00055   return(numConnect);
00056 }
00057 
00058 void clSurface::ConnectPatch(const int self)
00059 {
00060   // Reset the values
00061   int numberID = -1;
00062   int north    = -1;
00063   int south    = -1;
00064   int west     = -1;
00065   int east     = -1;
00066 
00067   int remainNorth = -1;
00068   int remainSouth = -1;
00069   int remainEast  = -1;
00070   int remainWest  = -1;
00071 
00072   // Calculate the corner co-ordinates
00073   dMatrix selfSW  = patchList[self]->GetCoordinates(0, 0);
00074   dMatrix selfSE  = patchList[self]->GetCoordinates(1, 0);
00075   dMatrix selfNW  = patchList[self]->GetCoordinates(0, 1);
00076   dMatrix selfNE  = patchList[self]->GetCoordinates(1, 1);
00077 
00078   for(int i=0; i<remainList.GetNumberItems(); i++)
00079   {
00080     int other = remainList.GetItem(i);
00081 
00082     if(other != self)
00083     {
00084       dMatrix otherSW = patchList[other]->GetCoordinates(0, 0);
00085       dMatrix otherSE = patchList[other]->GetCoordinates(1, 0);
00086       dMatrix otherNW = patchList[other]->GetCoordinates(0, 1);
00087       dMatrix otherNE = patchList[other]->GetCoordinates(1, 1);
00088 
00089       // Check for cennectivity
00090       if(selfNW==otherSW && selfNE==otherSE)
00091       {
00092         north       = other;
00093         remainNorth = i;
00094       }
00095       else if(selfNE==otherNW && selfSE==otherSW)
00096       {
00097         east       = other;
00098         remainEast = i;
00099       }
00100       else if(selfSE==otherNE && selfSW==otherNW)
00101       {
00102         south       = other;
00103         remainSouth = i;
00104       }
00105       else if(selfSW==otherSE && selfNW==otherNE)
00106       {
00107         west       = other;
00108         remainWest = i;
00109       }
00110     }
00111   }
00112 
00113   // Update existing connectivity entries
00114   if(north!=-1)
00115   {
00116     connectList[north]->south = self;
00117 
00118     // If the north patch is connected on all sides it can be deleted from the remainList
00119     if (connectList[north]->west != -1 && connectList[north]->north != -1 && connectList[north]->east != -1)
00120     {
00121       remainList.DeleteItem(remainNorth);
00122       if (remainEast  > remainNorth) remainEast--;
00123       if (remainSouth > remainNorth) remainSouth--;
00124       if (remainWest  > remainNorth) remainWest--;
00125     }
00126   }
00127 
00128   if(east !=-1)
00129   {
00130     connectList[east]->west  = self;
00131 
00132     // If the east patch is connected on all sides it can be deleted from the remainList
00133     if (connectList[east]->north != -1 && connectList[east]->east != -1 && connectList[east]->south != -1)
00134     {
00135       remainList.DeleteItem(remainEast);
00136       if (remainSouth > remainEast) remainSouth--;
00137       if (remainWest  > remainEast) remainWest--;
00138     }
00139   }
00140 
00141   if(south!=-1)
00142   {
00143     connectList[south]->north = self;
00144 
00145     // If the south patch is connected on all sides it can be deleted from the remainList
00146     if (connectList[south]->east != -1 && connectList[south]->south != -1 && connectList[south]->west != -1)
00147     {
00148       remainList.DeleteItem(remainSouth);
00149       if (remainWest > remainSouth) remainWest--;
00150     }
00151   }
00152 
00153   if(west !=-1)
00154   {
00155     connectList[west]->east  = self;
00156 
00157     // If the west patch is connected on all sides it can be deleted from the remainList
00158     if (connectList[west]->south != -1 && connectList[west]->west != -1 && connectList[west]->north != -1)
00159     {
00160       remainList.DeleteItem(remainWest);
00161     }
00162   }
00163 
00164   // Get Identification
00165   numberID = patchList[self]->GetNumberID();
00166 
00167   // Add new connectivity entry
00168   AddConnection(numberID, north, east, south, west);
00169 }
00170 
00171 void clSurface::CheckConnection(void)
00172 {
00173   int NSLoop = 0;  // 0 = no north-south loop; 1 = north-south loop
00174   int EWLoop = 0;  // 0 = no east-west loop; 1 east-west loop
00175 
00176   int startPatch, nextPatch, southPatch, westPatch;
00177 
00178   // Check if any patches exist
00179   if(GetNumberPatches() < 1)
00180   {
00181     throw clException("clSurface", "CheckConnection", "Surface does not contain any patches.");
00182   }
00183 
00184   // Check for north-south closed loop connection
00185   startPatch = 0;
00186   nextPatch  = connectList[startPatch]->north;
00187   while(nextPatch!=-1 && nextPatch!=startPatch)
00188   {
00189     nextPatch = connectList[nextPatch]->north;
00190   }
00191 
00192   if(nextPatch==startPatch)
00193   {
00194     NSLoop = 1;
00195   }
00196 
00197   // Check for east-west closed loop connection
00198   startPatch = 0;
00199   nextPatch  = connectList[startPatch]->east;
00200   while(nextPatch!=-1 && nextPatch!=startPatch)
00201   {
00202     nextPatch = connectList[nextPatch]->east;
00203   }
00204 
00205   if(nextPatch==startPatch)
00206   {
00207     EWLoop = 1;
00208   }
00209 
00210   // Try to correct
00211   if(NSLoop && EWLoop)
00212   {
00213     /*
00214     ** Double closed loop surface; cutting routine must still be implemented
00215     */
00216 
00217     throw clException("clSurface", "CheckConnection", "Double closed loop surface: Must still be implemented.");
00218   }
00219   else if(NSLoop && !EWLoop)
00220   {
00221     /*
00222     ** Single N-S closed loop surface; create E-W cut south of patch 0
00223     */
00224 
00225     // Cut patch 0
00226     nextPatch  = 0;
00227     southPatch = connectList[nextPatch]->south;
00228     connectList[nextPatch]->south  = -1;
00229     connectList[southPatch]->north = -1;
00230 
00231     // Cut all patches east of patch 0
00232     nextPatch = 0;
00233     while(connectList[nextPatch]->east != -1)
00234     {
00235       nextPatch  = connectList[nextPatch]->east;
00236       southPatch = connectList[nextPatch]->south;
00237       connectList[nextPatch]->south  = -1;
00238       connectList[southPatch]->north = -1;
00239     }
00240 
00241     // Cut all patches west of patch 0
00242     nextPatch = 0;
00243     while(connectList[nextPatch]->west != -1)
00244     {
00245       nextPatch = connectList[nextPatch]->west;
00246       southPatch = connectList[nextPatch]->south;
00247       connectList[nextPatch]->south  = -1;
00248       connectList[southPatch]->north = -1;
00249     }
00250   }
00251   else if(!NSLoop && EWLoop)
00252   {
00253     /*
00254     ** Single E-W closed loop surface; create N-S cut west of patch 0
00255     */
00256 
00257     // Cut patch 0
00258     nextPatch = 0;
00259     westPatch = connectList[nextPatch]->west;
00260     connectList[nextPatch]->west = -1;
00261     connectList[westPatch]->east = -1;
00262 
00263     // Cut all patches north of patch 0
00264     nextPatch = 0;
00265     while(connectList[nextPatch]->north != -1)
00266     {
00267       nextPatch = connectList[nextPatch]->north;
00268       westPatch = connectList[nextPatch]->west;
00269       connectList[nextPatch]->west = -1;
00270       connectList[westPatch]->east = -1;
00271     }
00272 
00273     // Cut all patches south of patch 0
00274     nextPatch = 0;
00275     while(connectList[nextPatch]->south != -1)
00276     {
00277       nextPatch = connectList[nextPatch]->south;
00278       westPatch = connectList[nextPatch]->west;
00279       connectList[nextPatch]->west = -1;
00280       connectList[westPatch]->east = -1;
00281     }
00282   }
00283 }

00286 /*
00287 ** Set up Parametric space
00288 */
00289 
00290 void clSurface::Parameterise(void)
00291 {
00292   // Get south-west patch
00293   int patchSW = 0;
00294   while(connectList[patchSW]->south!=-1)
00295   {
00296     patchSW = connectList[patchSW]->south;
00297   }
00298 
00299   while(connectList[patchSW]->west!=-1)
00300   {
00301     patchSW = connectList[patchSW]->west;
00302   }
00303 
00304   origin = patchSW;
00305 
00306   // Count number of nodes in u-direction
00307   int uCount       = 1;
00308   int patchPointer = patchSW;
00309   while(connectList[patchPointer]->east!=-1)
00310   {
00311     patchPointer = connectList[patchPointer]->east;
00312     uCount++;
00313   }
00314   uCount++; // 1 node more than patches
00315 
00316   // Count number of nodes in v-direction
00317   int vCount   = 1;
00318   patchPointer = patchSW;
00319   while(connectList[patchPointer]->north!=-1)
00320   {
00321     patchPointer = connectList[patchPointer]->north;
00322     vCount++;
00323   }
00324   vCount++; // 1 node more than patches
00325 
00326   // Calculate the delta's
00327   uDelta = 1.0/(uCount-1);
00328   vDelta = 1.0/(vCount-1);
00329 }
00330 
00331 /*
00332 ** Calculate the extremes
00333 */
00334 void clSurface::CalculateExtremes(void)
00335 {
00336   double xDummy;
00337   double yDummy;
00338   double zDummy;
00339 
00340   if(GetNumberPatches() < 1)
00341   {
00342     throw clException("clSurface", "CalculateExtremes", "Surface does not contain any patches.");
00343   }
00344 
00345   xMin = patchList[0]->GetMinX();
00346   xMax = patchList[0]->GetMaxX();
00347   yMin = patchList[0]->GetMinY();
00348   yMax = patchList[0]->GetMaxY();
00349   zMin = patchList[0]->GetMinZ();
00350   zMax = patchList[0]->GetMaxZ();
00351   for(int p=1; p<GetNumberPatches(); p++)
00352   {
00353     xDummy = patchList[p]->GetMinX();    xMin = (xMin < xDummy) ? xMin : xDummy;
00354     xDummy = patchList[p]->GetMaxX();    xMax = (xMax > xDummy) ? xMax : xDummy;
00355     yDummy = patchList[p]->GetMinY();    yMin = (yMin < yDummy) ? yMin : yDummy;
00356     yDummy = patchList[p]->GetMaxY();    yMax = (yMax > yDummy) ? yMax : yDummy;
00357     zDummy = patchList[p]->GetMinZ();    zMin = (zMin < zDummy) ? zMin : zDummy;
00358     zDummy = patchList[p]->GetMaxZ();    zMax = (zMax > zDummy) ? zMax : zDummy;
00359   }
00360 }
00361 
00362 /*
00363 ** Method initialise
00364 */
00365 void clSurface::Initialise(void)
00366 {
00367   if(!initialised)
00368   {
00369     CheckConnection();
00370     Parameterise();
00371     CalculateExtremes();
00372 
00373     initialised = 1;
00374   }
00375 }

00441 
00442 int clSurface::GetPatchEntry(const int i, const int j) const
00443 {
00444   // Find correct patch
00445   int patchPointer = origin;
00446 
00447   int ii=0;
00448   while(connectList[patchPointer]->east!=-1 && ii<i)
00449   {
00450     patchPointer = connectList[patchPointer]->east;
00451     ii++;
00452   }
00453 
00454   int jj=0;
00455   while(connectList[patchPointer]->north!=-1 && jj<j)
00456   {
00457     patchPointer = connectList[patchPointer]->north;
00458     jj++;
00459   }
00460 
00461   if(ii<i || jj<j)
00462   {
00463     char message[MESLEN];
00464     sprintf(message, "Invalid values for i and/or j.\n  I = %d\n  J = %d", i, j);
00465     throw clException("clSurface", "GetPatchEntry", message);
00466   }
00467 
00468   return(patchPointer);
00469 }

00476 int clSurface::AddPatch(const clPatch &newPatch)
00477 {
00478   // Add to list
00479   int entryNumber = patchList.AddItem(newPatch);
00480 
00481   // Create new connectivity list
00482   ConnectPatch(entryNumber);
00483 
00484   // Reset initialisation-flag
00485   initialised = 0;
00486 
00487   return(entryNumber);
00488 }

00496   initialised = 0;

00501 int clSurface::DeletePatch(const int entryNumber)
00502 {
00503   if(entryNumber<0 || entryNumber>=GetNumberPatches())
00504   {
00505     throw clException("clSurface", "DeletePatch", "No patch with specified entry.");
00506   }
00507 
00508   return (patchList.DeleteItem(entryNumber));
00509 }

00530 
00531 void clSurface::BuildPatchConnectivity(void)
00532 {
00533   int numPatch   = GetNumberPatches();
00534   int numConnect = GetNumberConnect();
00535   int numRemain  = remainList.GetNumberItems();
00536 
00537   // Delete old connections
00538   for (int i=0; i<numConnect; i++)
00539   {
00540     connectList.DeleteItem(i);
00541   }
00542 
00543   {
00544     for (int i=0; i<numRemain; i++)
00545     {
00546       remainList.DeleteItem(i);
00547     }
00548   }
00549 
00550   // Create new connections
00551   {
00552     for(int i=0; i<numPatch; i++)
00553     {
00554       ConnectPatch(i);
00555     }
00556   }
00557 }
00558 
00559 
00560 /*
00561 ** Method to create a surface out of defined points
00562 */
00563 void clSurface::CreatePatches(const dMatrix &pointsX, const dMatrix &pointsY, const dMatrix &pointsZ)
00564 {
00565   // Declare the derivative matrices
00566   dMatrix pointsXu,  pointsYu,  pointsZu;
00567   dMatrix pointsXv,  pointsYv,  pointsZv;
00568   dMatrix pointsXuv, pointsYuv, pointsZuv;
00569 
00570   // Create a carpet
00571   clCarpet carpet(1, pointsX, pointsY, pointsZ);
00572   carpet.GetFirstDerivativesU(pointsXu, pointsYu, pointsZu);
00573   carpet.GetFirstDerivativesV(pointsXv, pointsYv, pointsZv);
00574   carpet.GetCrossDerivatives(pointsXuv, pointsYuv, pointsZuv);
00575 
00576   // Count the patches
00577   int numberPatches = 0;
00578 
00579   // Get matrix dimensions
00580   int rmax = pointsX.GetNumberRows();     // rows    = constant v-values
00581   int cmax = pointsX.GetNumberColumns();  // columns = constant u-values
00582 
00583   // Declare geometry matrices
00584   dMatrix X(2, 2), XU(2, 2), XV(2, 2), XUV(2, 2);
00585   dMatrix Y(2, 2), YU(2, 2), YV(2, 2), YUV(2, 2);
00586   dMatrix Z(2, 2), ZU(2, 2), ZV(2, 2), ZUV(2, 2);
00587 
00588   // Remember: 1 element less than nodes (both directions)
00589   for(int r=1; r<rmax; r++)
00590   {
00591     for(int c=1; c<cmax; c++)
00592     {
00593       // Fill the X geometry matrices
00594       X.SetElement(1, 1, pointsX(r, c));       X.SetElement(1, 2, pointsX(r+1, c));
00595       X.SetElement(2, 1, pointsX(r, c+1));     X.SetElement(2, 2, pointsX(r+1, c+1));
00596 
00597       XU.SetElement(1, 1, pointsXu(r, c));     XU.SetElement(1, 2, pointsXu(r+1, c));
00598       XU.SetElement(2, 1, pointsXu(r, c+1));   XU.SetElement(2, 2, pointsXu(r+1, c+1));
00599 
00600       XV.SetElement(1, 1, pointsXv(r, c));     XV.SetElement(1, 2, pointsXv(r+1, c));
00601       XV.SetElement(2, 1, pointsXv(r, c+1));   XV.SetElement(2, 2, pointsXv(r+1, c+1));
00602 
00603       XUV.SetElement(1, 1, pointsXuv(r, c));   XUV.SetElement(1, 2, pointsXuv(r+1, c));
00604       XUV.SetElement(2, 1, pointsXuv(r, c+1)); XUV.SetElement(2, 2, pointsXuv(r+1, c+1));
00605 
00606       // Fill the Y geometry matrices
00607       Y.SetElement(1, 1, pointsY(r, c));       Y.SetElement(1, 2, pointsY(r+1, c));
00608       Y.SetElement(2, 1, pointsY(r, c+1));     Y.SetElement(2, 2, pointsY(r+1, c+1));
00609 
00610       YU.SetElement(1, 1, pointsYu(r, c));     YU.SetElement(1, 2, pointsYu(r+1, c));
00611       YU.SetElement(2, 1, pointsYu(r, c+1));   YU.SetElement(2, 2, pointsYu(r+1, c+1));
00612 
00613       YV.SetElement(1, 1, pointsYv(r, c));     YV.SetElement(1, 2, pointsYv(r+1, c));
00614       YV.SetElement(2, 1, pointsYv(r, c+1));   YV.SetElement(2, 2, pointsYv(r+1, c+1));
00615 
00616       YUV.SetElement(1, 1, pointsYuv(r, c));   YUV.SetElement(1, 2, pointsYuv(r+1, c));
00617       YUV.SetElement(2, 1, pointsYuv(r, c+1)); YUV.SetElement(2, 2, pointsYuv(r+1, c+1));
00618 
00619 
00620       // Fill the Z geometry matrices
00621       Z.SetElement(1, 1, pointsZ(r, c));       Z.SetElement(1, 2, pointsZ(r+1, c));
00622       Z.SetElement(2, 1, pointsZ(r, c+1));     Z.SetElement(2, 2, pointsZ(r+1, c+1));
00623 
00624       ZU.SetElement(1, 1, pointsZu(r, c));     ZU.SetElement(1, 2, pointsZu(r+1, c));
00625       ZU.SetElement(2, 1, pointsZu(r, c+1));   ZU.SetElement(2, 2, pointsZu(r+1, c+1));
00626 
00627       ZV.SetElement(1, 1, pointsZv(r, c));     ZV.SetElement(1, 2, pointsZv(r+1, c));
00628       ZV.SetElement(2, 1, pointsZv(r, c+1));   ZV.SetElement(2, 2, pointsZv(r+1, c+1));
00629 
00630       ZUV.SetElement(1, 1, pointsZuv(r, c));   ZUV.SetElement(1, 2, pointsZuv(r+1, c));
00631       ZUV.SetElement(2, 1, pointsZuv(r, c+1)); ZUV.SetElement(2, 2, pointsZuv(r+1, c+1));
00632 
00633       // Create a new patch
00634       clPatch patch(numberPatches++, X, XU, XV, XUV, Y, YU, YV, YUV, Z, ZU, ZV, ZUV, 'H');
00635 
00636       // Add patch to surface
00637       AddPatchDelayed(patch);
00638     }
00639   }
00640 
00641   // Build the connectivity list
00642   BuildPatchConnectivity();
00643 }
00644 
00645 
00646 /*
00647 ** Method for calculating the normal vector to the surface
00648 */
00649 dMatrix clSurface::GetNormal(const double u, const double v)
00650 {
00651   dMatrix normal;
00652 
00653   normal.SetNumberRows(1);
00654   normal.SetNumberColumns(3);
00655 
00656   if(!initialised)
00657   {
00658     Initialise();
00659   }
00660 
00661   double uu = u;
00662   double vv = v;
00663 
00664   // Truncate uu and vv upon PRECISION
00665   if(fabs(uu - 0.0) < PRECISION)      uu = 0.0;
00666   else if(fabs(uu - 1.0) < PRECISION) uu = 1.0;
00667 
00668   if(fabs(vv - 0.0) < PRECISION)      vv = 0.0;
00669   else if(fabs(vv - 1.0) < PRECISION) vv = 1.0;
00670 
00671   // Check validity of uu and vv
00672   if(uu < 0.0 || uu > 1.0 || vv < 0.0 || vv > 1.0)
00673   {
00674     char message[MESLEN];
00675     sprintf(message, "Invalid value for u and/or v.\n  U = %f\n V = %f", uu, vv);
00676     throw clException("clSurface", "GetNormal", message);
00677   }
00678 
00679   // Find correct patch
00680   int i = 0; // Points to vertical node lines
00681   while(uu-(i+1)*uDelta > PRECISION)
00682   {
00683     i++;
00684   }
00685 
00686   int j = 0;  // Points to horizontal nodes lines
00687   while(vv-(j+1)*vDelta > PRECISION)
00688   {
00689     j++;
00690   }
00691 
00692   int patchPointer = GetPatchEntry(i, j);
00693 
00694   // Transform to patch local co-ordinate system
00695   double uPatch = (uu - i*uDelta)/uDelta;
00696   double vPatch = (vv - j*vDelta)/vDelta;
00697 
00698   // Truncate uPatch and vPatc upon PRECISION
00699   if(fabs(uPatch - 0.0) < PRECISION)      uPatch = 0.0;
00700   else if(fabs(uPatch - 1.0) < PRECISION) uPatch = 1.0;
00701 
00702   if(fabs(vPatch - 0.0) < PRECISION)      vPatch = 0.0;
00703   else if(fabs(vPatch - 1.0) < PRECISION) vPatch = 1.0;
00704 
00705 
00706   // Calculate the normal
00707   normal = patchList[patchPointer]->GetNormal(uPatch, vPatch);
00708 
00709   return (normal);
00710 }
00711

00713 ** Methods for obtaining the extremes

00718   if(!initialised)

00720     Initialise();
00721   }
00722 
00723   return(xMin);

00777 /*
00778 ** Methods for operations
00779 */
00780 
00781 clSurface& clSurface::Assign(const clSurface &source)
00782 {
00783   SetNumberID(source.GetNumberID());
00784 
00785   for(int i=0; i<source.GetNumberPatches(); i++)
00786   {
00787     AddPatchDelayed(source.GetPatch(i));
00788   }
00789 
00790   BuildPatchConnectivity();
00791 
00792   return (*this);
00793 }
00794 
00795 clSurface& clSurface::operator=(const clSurface &source)
00796 {
00797   return(Assign(source));
00798 }
00799 
00800 dMatrix clSurface::GetCoordinates(const double u, const double v)
00801 {
00802   dMatrix uDummy(1, 1);
00803   dMatrix vDummy(1, 1);
00804 
00805   uDummy.SetElement(1, 1, u);
00806   vDummy.SetElement(1, 1, v);
00807 
00808   return(GetCoordinates(uDummy, vDummy));
00809 }
00810 
00811 dMatrix clSurface::operator()(const double u, const double v)
00812 {
00813   return(GetCoordinates(u, v));
00814 }
00815 
00816 dMatrix clSurface::GetCoordinates(const dMatrix &u, const dMatrix &v)
00817 {
00818   dMatrix coord;
00819 
00820   if((u.GetNumberColumns() != 1 || u.GetNumberRows() == 0) ||
00821      (v.GetNumberColumns() != 1 || v.GetNumberRows() != u.GetNumberRows()))
00822   {
00823     throw clException("clSurface", "GetCoordinates", "Invalid dimesions for matrices u and/or v.");
00824   }
00825   else
00826   {
00827     coord.SetNumberRows(u.GetNumberRows());
00828     coord.SetNumberColumns(3);
00829 
00830     if(!initialised)
00831     {
00832       Initialise();
00833     }
00834 
00835     // Do for all specified points
00836     for(int r=1; r<=u.GetNumberRows(); r++)
00837     {
00838       double uu = u(r, 1);
00839       double vv = v(r, 1);
00840 
00841       // Truncate uu and vv upon PRECISION
00842       if(fabs(uu - 0.0) < PRECISION)      uu = 0.0;
00843       else if(fabs(uu - 1.0) < PRECISION) uu = 1.0;
00844 
00845       if(fabs(vv - 0.0) < PRECISION)      vv = 0.0;
00846       else if(fabs(vv - 1.0) < PRECISION) vv = 1.0;
00847 
00848       // Check validity of uu and vv
00849       if(uu < 0.0 || uu > 1.0 || vv < 0.0 || vv > 1.0)
00850       {
00851         throw clException("clSurface", "GetCoordinates", "Invalid value for u and/or v.");
00852       }
00853 
00854       // Find correct patch
00855       int i = 0; // Points to vertical node lines
00856       while(uu-(i+1)*uDelta > PRECISION)
00857       {
00858         i++;
00859       }
00860 
00861       int j = 0;  // Points to horizontal nodes lines
00862       while(vv-(j+1)*vDelta > PRECISION)
00863       {
00864         j++;
00865       }
00866 
00867       int patchPointer = GetPatchEntry(i, j);
00868 
00869       // Transform to patch local co-ordinate system
00870       double uPatch = (uu - i*uDelta)/uDelta;
00871       double vPatch = (vv - j*vDelta)/vDelta;
00872 
00873       // Truncate uPatch and vPatc upon PRECISION
00874       if(fabs(uPatch - 0.0) < PRECISION)      uPatch = 0.0;
00875       else if(fabs(uPatch - 1.0) < PRECISION) uPatch = 1.0;
00876 
00877       if(fabs(vPatch - 0.0) < PRECISION)      vPatch = 0.0;
00878       else if(fabs(vPatch - 1.0) < PRECISION) vPatch = 1.0;
00879 
00880 
00881       // Calculate the co-ordinates
00882       dMatrix temp = patchList[patchPointer]->GetCoordinates(uPatch, vPatch);
00883 
00884       coord.SetElement(r, 1, temp(1, 1));
00885       coord.SetElement(r, 2, temp(1, 2));
00886       coord.SetElement(r, 3, temp(1, 3));
00887     }
00888   }
00889 
00890   return (coord);
00891 }
00892 
00893 dMatrix clSurface::operator()(const dMatrix &u, const dMatrix &v)
00894 {
00895   return(GetCoordinates(u, v));
00896 }
